p: In relation to this issue, it is observed that the moisture content of spray dried chicken meat protein hydrolysates is seen to be below 2% in a study. The authors stated that the main reason why the moisture content remains at such low levels attributed to the concentration of the carrier agent used and the inlet temperature of the in the feed solution itself ( Kurozowa et al., 2009). In another study, the moisture content of the cheese powder which produced by using the spray drier is about 2% ( Erbay et al., 2015).
